ud1.4:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā nerañjarāya tīre ajapālanigrodhe paṭhamābhisambuddho.
ud1.4:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
ud1.4:3.4: Atha kho bhagavā tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsi.
ud1.4:4.1: Atha kho aññataro huṃhuṅkajātiko brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud1.4:4.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
ud1.4:4.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud1.4:4.5: “kittāvatā nu kho, bho gotama, brāhmaṇo hoti, katame ca pana brāhmaṇakaraṇā dhammā”ti?
ud1.4:5.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
